sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含有"反抗，抵抗"之意。
means: oppose ： 普通用词，可表不同程度的抵抗。
defy ： 指公开地、勇敢地反对或抵抗，有时含公然挑衅之意。
withstand ： 较正式用词，指坚强地抵抗攻击或压力，有时也指抗住影响或吸引力。
resist ： 指积极地反抗一种攻击或暴力，或诱惑。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"忍受"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: stand, bear, endure, tolerate, suffer, abide, withstand
means: stand ： 口语用词，常可与bear换用，但前者侧重指经受得起，后者强调容忍，是普通用语。
endure ： 书面用词，指长时间忍受痛苦和不幸，着重体力或意志力的坚强不屈服。
tolerate ： 指以自我克制的态度，对待令人反感或厌恶的东西，含默认宽容意味。
suffer ： 通常指非自愿或被迫忍受各种痛苦、困难或不快，强调受到苦难。
abide ： 指忍受长期的痛苦或折磨，强调耐心和屈从。多用于否定句和疑问句中。
withstand ： 指因具有一定实力、权力或能力而能忍受某种情况。

sentence.Network_en: The fabric is strong enough to withstand harsh processing.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种织物非常结实，能经受粗加工。

sentence.Network_en: Wallcoverings and floors should be able to withstand steam and splashes.
sentence.Network_cn: 墙面材料和地板都应该能耐热汽且防水。

sentence.Network_en: Their arguments do not withstand the most superficial scrutiny.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们的论据经不起一点推敲。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English withstandan, from the prefix with- 'against' + the verb stand

entry.def: If something or someone withstands a force or action, they survive it or do not give in to it.

example.ex: ...armoured vehicles designed to withstand chemical attack...
example.tran: 具有抵御化学武器袭击的设计功能的装甲车

example.ex: Exercise really can help you withstand stresses and strains more easily.
example.tran: 锻炼真的能帮助你更轻松地应对压力和紧张情绪。

sentences.sentence: "The new material withstands even the greatest wear and tear"

means.word_mean: 2. stand up or offer resistance to somebody or something

auth_sentence.content: An ambitious man will...withstand the seductions of his senses.
auth_sentence.res_content: An ambitious man will...withstand the seductions of his senses.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: An ambitious man will...withstand the seductions of his senses.

auth_sentence.content: Grim defensive houses strong enough to withstand party feuds.
auth_sentence.res_content: Grim defensive houses strong enough to withstand party feuds.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Grim defensive houses strong enough to withstand party feuds.

auth_sentence.content: They were not designed to withstand unfought fires indefinitely.
auth_sentence.res_content: They were not designed to withstand unfought fires indefinitely.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They were not designed to withstand unfought fires indefinitely.

stems_affixes.word_buile: with向后,相反+drawn被拉→被拉回去→隐退的
with向后,相反+draw拉→向相反拉→撤退
with向后,相反+hold拿住→拿住不让向前→阻止
with向后,相反+stand站→站在和别人相反的位置

Sentence.sentence: Their ability to withstand almost any disaster makes them seem like something out of a comic book.

Early models often failed to withstand crashes, however, so in 1965 the device was completely redesigned and moved to the rear of the plane – the area least subject to impact – from its original position in the landing wells (起落架舱)
Placed in an insulated (隔绝的) case and surrounded by a quarter-inch-thick panels of stainless steel, the boxes can withstand massive force and temperatures up to 2,000℉.

Back in the good old days—say, two years ago, when the last of my children suffered the ordeal (折磨)—a high-school student applying to college could procrastinate all the way to New Year's Day of their senior year, assuming they could withstand the parental pestering (烦扰).
